songs.title: When I Found You
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I believe we all have one true love
Somewhere in this world, I do (I do, I do)
When it seemed
All my dreams were falling through
That's when I found you
I believe for every heart
That whispers in the dark
There's a ray of light somewhere
Shining through
It was sink or swim
When the tide came in

[Chorus]
I found myself when I found you
I found the closest thing to Heaven
Yes, in you I found the deepest love I knew
Ooh, ooh, oh, I'll believe
Yes, it's true
I found myself when I found you
Oh, yeah

[Verse 2]
I believe (I believe)
For every door (Every door)
That's closing for every heartbreak
There's hope for something new
From the ashes rise a glimpse of paradise
It still flickered in your eyes

[Chorus]
I found myself when I found you
I found the closest thing to Heaven
Yes, in you I found the deepest love I knew
Ooh, ooh, oh, I'll believe
Yes, it's true
I found myself when I found you

[Bridge]
A life unfolds, no one knows
I thought love was just a tingling of the skin
I felt so alone, all alone
More than you could ever know
You show deep love, sweet love

[Chorus]
When I found you
I found the closest thing to Heaven
I found the deepest love I knew
When I found you
I found the closest thing to Heaven
Yes, in you I found the deepest love I knew
Ooh, ooh, oh, I'll believe
Yes, it's true
I found myself when I found you
